author: Alice
content: Did you know? The first recorded cricket match took place in 1646 in Kent, England.

author: Bob
content: Cricket is the second most popular sport in the world, with over 2.5 billion fans.

author: Charlie
content: The longest cricket match in history lasted for 12 days between England and South Africa in 1939.

author: Dave
content: Sachin Tendulkar, often referred to as the 'God of Cricket,' is the only player to score 100 international centuries.

author: Eve
content: The highest individual score in a Test match is 400, made by Brian Lara of the West Indies in 2004.

author: Frank
content: The Cricket World Cup is the most-watched sporting event in the world after the FIFA World Cup.

author: Grace
content: Australia has won the most Cricket World Cups, with a total of 5 titles.

author: Heidi
content: The Ashes is a historic Test cricket series played between England and Australia since 1882.

author: Ivan
content: Cricket is the national sport of England, but it is most popular in India.

author: Judy
content: The Indian Premier League (IPL) is the most popular and lucrative T20 cricket league in the world.
